rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调早产的长期社会经济影响通过分析加拿大六年内的所有活产并对儿童进行二十多年的跟踪，研究人员发现，早产以及早产对认知、发育和身体健康的影响与较低的收入、就业和大学入学率有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-highlights-long-term-socioeconomic-effects-of-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-highlights-long-term-socioeconomic-effects-of-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67731ebb-e1e7-4f7d-b24d-717e592e1ba4 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 14:35:06 -0500 Study highlights long-term socioeconomic effects of preterm birth
应对策略和复原力可以提高抚养残疾儿童的父母的生活质量对于残疾儿童的父母来说，找到时间专注于自己可能很困难。然而，一项新的研究发现，正确的应对策略和复原力可以极大地帮助应对抚养有特殊需要的儿童的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Coping-strategies-and-resilience-can-boost-quality-of-life-for-parents-raise-disabled-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Coping-strategies-and-resilience-can-boost-quality-of-life-for-parents-raise-disabled-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdd98c3b-7815-4185-a445-6c516e0ffadb Wed, 06 Nov 2024 14:29:18 -0500 Coping strategies and resilience can boost quality of life for parents raising disabled children
脑细胞形成多个坐标系来指导行为动作神经科学家发现，脑细胞可以形成多个坐标系，告诉我们在一系列行为中“我们在哪里”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Brain-cells-form-multiple-coordinate-systems-to-guide-behavioral-actions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Brain-cells-form-multiple-coordinate-systems-to-guide-behavioral-actions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9795fd32-2da7-4ba7-9a80-09a6a71826f3 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 14:21:28 -0500 Brain cells form multiple coordinate systems to guide behavioral actions
研究人员通过癌症免疫疗法揭示心肌炎背后的免疫机制一些接受免疫检查点抑制剂（一种癌症免疫疗法）治疗的患者会出现一种危险的心脏炎症，称为心肌炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-uncover-immune-mechanism-behind-myocarditis-from-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-uncover-immune-mechanism-behind-myocarditis-from-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f55c876-b69e-4253-bfb7-43c73b778d4b Wed, 06 Nov 2024 14:16:06 -0500 Researchers uncover immune mechanism behind myocarditis from cancer immunotherapy
研究旨在降低肥胖孕妇的剖腹产率肥胖孕妇面临并发症的风险增加，包括需要剖腹产，剖腹产本身也有一系列风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-aims-to-reduce-C-section-rates-in-pregnant-women-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-aims-to-reduce-C-section-rates-in-pregnant-women-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4ca3293-268d-43a4-a0c8-45ba6e72c2fc Wed, 06 Nov 2024 14:09:01 -0500 Study aims to reduce C-section rates in pregnant women with obesity
新研究揭示肿瘤细胞如何逃避免疫系统判断细胞的健康状况相对容易：在细胞表面，细胞呈现出其内部几乎所有蛋白质的碎片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-study-reveals-how-tumor-cells-evade-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-study-reveals-how-tumor-cells-evade-the-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e0252f4-c1ed-4836-8ced-e94cb1b5f11b Wed, 06 Nov 2024 13:57:00 -0500 New study reveals how tumor cells evade the immune system
研究揭示肠道中的某些大肠杆菌如何促进结肠癌科学家们发现肠道中的某些大肠杆菌如何通过与肠道细胞结合并释放破坏 DNA 的毒素来促进结肠癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-uncovers-how-certain-E-coli-bacteria-in-the-gut-promote-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-uncovers-how-certain-E-coli-bacteria-in-the-gut-promote-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=360d6b04-7e5a-4727-a6b2-23092d49c7dd Wed, 06 Nov 2024 13:49:00 -0500 Study uncovers how certain E. coli bacteria in the gut promote colon cancer
多目标粪便 DNA 测试显示出早期结直肠癌检测的希望泰国最近的一项前瞻性横断面研究表明，多目标粪便 DNA 检测对于检测泰国个体中的结直肠癌 (CRC) 具有高度敏感性和特异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Multitarget-stool-DNA-test-shows-promise-for-early-colorectal-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Multitarget-stool-DNA-test-shows-promise-for-early-colorectal-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9311c6fe-e6c3-4c4a-91e2-80b94662b23e Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:52:00 -0500 Multitarget stool DNA test shows promise for early colorectal cancer detection
纳米级传感器通过呼吸化学检测肺癌呼出的气体中含有有关体内发生情况的化学线索，包括肺癌等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Nanoscale-sensor-detects-lung-cancer-through-breath-chemistry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Nanoscale-sensor-detects-lung-cancer-through-breath-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a16b998-0eba-409c-90a2-2167325b2267 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:48:35 -0500 Nanoscale sensor detects lung cancer through breath chemistry
世界首项比较研究显示单孔机器人胸腺切除术的安全性联合研究小组（高丽大学医学院胸心血管外科教授 Jun-hee Lee、Hyun-koo Kim、Jin-Wook Hwang、Jae-Ho Chung）公布了世界上第一个单项研究的比较结果使用单端口机器人系统进行端口机器人胸腺切除术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Worlde28099s-first-comparative-study-shows-safety-of-single-port-robotic-thymection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Worlde28099s-first-comparative-study-shows-safety-of-single-port-robotic-thymcision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7a57658-37b3-4664-bbfc-6ab35303b1b3 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:44:46 -0500 World’s first comparative study shows safety of single-port robotic thymectomy
